import React, { useState } from "react" import "./tugas11.css" const Tugas11 = () => { let [data, setData] = useState([ {nama: "Nanas", hargaTotal: 100000, beratTotal: 4000 }, {nama: "Manggis", hargaTotal: 350000, beratTotal: 10000}, {nama: "Nangka", hargaTotal: 90000, beratTotal: 2000}, {nama: "Durian", hargaTotal: 400000, beratTotal: 5000}, {nama: "Strawberry", hargaTotal: 120000, beratTotal: 6000} ]) return( <>

Daftar Harga Buah

{data !== null && ( <> {data.map((res, index) => { return( ) })} )}
No. Nama Harga Total Berat Total Harga per kg Aksi
{index+1} {res.nama} {res.hargaTotal} {res.beratTotal} {res.hargaTotal/(res.beratTotal/1000)} AneMarie
) } export default Tugas11
